resources.string:
We have tried to make the initial configuration of Schoolplanner4Untis as simple as possible. Therefore, our configuration assistant helps you through the first steps. 

If you use this app the first time, please use the easy mode. The assistant will guide you through the creation process of a Loginset in three easy steps. 

If you do not need any help, choose the expert mode. There, you are able to insert all needed information in a single step.
